content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253312,"originalJapaneseLine":"近くに上杉陣地があり気になっている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a Uesugi camp nearby, and they seem to be concerned about it."},{"lineNumber":253313,"originalJapaneseLine":"上杉陣地に寄る","translatedEnglishLine":"Approach the Uesugi camp."},{"lineNumber":253314,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信、愛の会話、慕われている謙信","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin, a conversation about love, Kenshin is admired."},{"lineNumber":253315,"originalJapaneseLine":"虎子のクマ耳に興味を持つピグとあてな","translatedEnglishLine":"Pigu and Atena are interested in Torako's bear ears."},{"lineNumber":253316,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t途中の村でモンスター退治","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster hunting in a village along the way."},{"lineNumber":253317,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tお礼でアナセルを犯す","translatedEnglishLine":"As thanks, they rape Anasel."},{"lineNumber":253318,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t警備隊が困っている","translatedEnglishLine":"The security squad is in trouble."},{"lineNumber":253319,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの先の街道に凶悪なモンスターが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"There is a vicious monster on the road ahead."},{"lineNumber":253320,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t軍隊で無いと倒せない","translatedEnglishLine":"It cannot be defeated without an army."},{"lineNumber":253321,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\t街道を塞ぐ巨大なモンスター","translatedEnglishLine":"A huge monster blocking the highway."},{"lineNumber":253322,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":253323,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tラングバウに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at Rangbau."},{"lineNumber":253324,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t作戦会議の前にシーラと寝る","translatedEnglishLine":"Sleep with Sheila before the strategy meeting."},{"lineNumber":253325,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t司令部で戦況状況を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hear the war situation at headquarters."},{"lineNumber":253326,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地下室、ロレックス将軍他多数が","translatedEnglishLine":"In the basement, General Rolex and many others..."},{"lineNumber":253327,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tチュパ病に感染し隔離されている","translatedEnglishLine":"They are infected with Chupa disease and quarantined."},{"lineNumber":253328,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t暗い雰囲気だがランスは前向き","translatedEnglishLine":"The mood is gloomy, but Rance is positive."},{"lineNumber":253329,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺が魔人を倒せば万事解決","translatedEnglishLine":"If I defeat the demon, everything will be resolved."},{"lineNumber":253330,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物襲撃の報告が来たので出撃","translatedEnglishLine":"A report of a monster attack arrives, so they deploy."},{"lineNumber":253331,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦場に到着するが","translatedEnglishLine":"They arrive at the battlefield, but..."},{"lineNumber":253332,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t目指すは魔人なので迂回する","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the target is the demon, they take a detour."},{"lineNumber":253333,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、どこかのヘルマン砦","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at some Helman fortress."},{"lineNumber":253334,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒メイドの攻撃を受けていた","translatedEnglishLine":"They were under attack by apostle maids."},{"lineNumber":253335,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍と偶然につれしょん","translatedEnglishLine":"Encountered the monster general by chance."},{"lineNumber":253336,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":253337,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍を倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeated the monster general."},{"lineNumber":253338,"originalJapaneseLine":"腹の中からは年寄りでがっかり","translatedEnglishLine":"Disappointed, it was an old man from inside."},{"lineNumber":253339,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tラングバウ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangbau."},{"lineNumber":253340,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラとシィルのダブル奴隷を","translatedEnglishLine":"With Sheila and Shiru, a double slave affair."},{"lineNumber":253341,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tはべらしてくつろぐランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance relaxes with them attending him."},{"lineNumber":253342,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその夜・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That night..."},{"lineNumber":253343,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラとシィルとセックス","translatedEnglishLine":"Sex with Sheila and Shiru."},{"lineNumber":253344,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t朝から忙しそうな大統領シーラ","translatedEnglishLine":"President Sheila looks busy from the morning."},{"lineNumber":253345,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクの居場所の情報が入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Information arrives about the location of demon Kessel Link."},{"lineNumber":253346,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tトランシルバニアの森に入った","translatedEnglishLine":"Entered the forest of Transylvania."},{"lineNumber":253347,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t昼間です","translatedEnglishLine":"It is daytime."},{"lineNumber":253348,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tご機嫌のサテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is in a good mood."},{"lineNumber":253349,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが自分の助言を聞いてくれた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance listened to her advice."},{"lineNumber":253350,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tすぐには出ずに昼寝","translatedEnglishLine":"They don't go out immediately but take a nap."},{"lineNumber":253351,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tそして夕方になってから森に出撃","translatedEnglishLine":"Then they head out to the forest in the evening."},{"lineNumber":253352,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tアミトス将軍が同行","translatedEnglishLine":"General Amitos accompanies them."},{"lineNumber":253353,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t夜の森を進撃中","translatedEnglishLine":"Advancing through the forest at night."},{"lineNumber":253354,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアミトスによる怪談話","translatedEnglishLine":"Scary stories told by Amitos."},{"lineNumber":253355,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリリムという娘、森の売春宿","translatedEnglishLine":"A girl named Lilim, a brothel in the forest."},{"lineNumber":253356,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion."},{"lineNumber":253357,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒メイド達の日常","translatedEnglishLine":"The everyday life of apostle maids."},{"lineNumber":253358,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t侵入者警報が鳴り使徒メイドが迎撃に出る","translatedEnglishLine":"An intruder alarm sounds; apostle maids go out to intercept."},{"lineNumber":253359,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクが強くなるのは夜","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Kessel Link grows stronger at night."},{"lineNumber":253360,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t何故にその夜に出撃するのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Why do they sortie out that night?"},{"lineNumber":253361,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアミトスとサテラが疑問を投げかける","translatedEnglishLine":"Amitos and Satera raise this question."},{"lineNumber":253362,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion."},{"lineNumber":253363,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒メイド達、不幸な生い立ち","translatedEnglishLine":"Apostle maids have unfortunate backgrounds."},{"lineNumber":253364,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクに救われた","translatedEnglishLine":"They were saved by Kessel Link."},{"lineNumber":253365,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒メイドが現れ警告を告げる","translatedEnglishLine":"An apostle maid appears and issues a warning."},{"lineNumber":253366,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":253367,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t脅迫して情報を聞きだそうとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"They try to extract information through threats,"},{"lineNumber":253368,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクへの忠誠心は高く失敗","translatedEnglishLine":"But their loyalty to Kessel Link is strong, so it fails."},{"lineNumber":253369,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t逃げられてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"They manage to escape."},{"lineNumber":253370,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり朝","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time they arrive at the mansion, it's completely morning."},{"lineNumber":253371,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t移動中に夜が明けると計算していた","translatedEnglishLine":"They had calculated that night would dawn during the move."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くに上杉陣地があり気になっている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a Uesugi camp nearby, and they seem to be concerned about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉陣地に寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Approach the Uesugi camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信、愛の会話、慕われている謙信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, a conversation about love, Kenshin is admired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虎子のクマ耳に興味を持つピグとあてな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pigu and Atena are interested in Torako's bear ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中の村でモンスター退治
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster hunting in a village along the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お礼でアナセルを犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As thanks, they rape Anasel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警備隊が困っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The security squad is in trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この先の街道に凶悪なモンスターが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a vicious monster on the road ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍隊で無いと倒せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It cannot be defeated without an army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を塞ぐ巨大なモンスター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge monster blocking the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Rangbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦会議の前にシーラと寝る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sleep with Sheila before the strategy meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部で戦況状況を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear the war situation at headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下室、ロレックス将軍他多数が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the basement, General Rolex and many others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チュパ病に感染し隔離されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are infected with Chupa disease and quarantined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗い雰囲気だがランスは前向き
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mood is gloomy, but Rance is positive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が魔人を倒せば万事解決
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I defeat the demon, everything will be resolved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物襲撃の報告が来たので出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report of a monster attack arrives, so they deploy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に到着するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the battlefield, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目指すは魔人なので迂回する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the target is the demon, they take a detour.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、どこかのヘルマン砦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at some Helman fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイドの攻撃を受けていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were under attack by apostle maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍と偶然につれしょん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encountered the monster general by chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the monster general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹の中からは年寄りでがっかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Disappointed, it was an old man from inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラとシィルのダブル奴隷を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With Sheila and Shiru, a double slave affair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はべらしてくつろぐランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance relaxes with them attending him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラとシィルとセックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex with Sheila and Shiru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝から忙しそうな大統領シーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: President Sheila looks busy from the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクの居場所の情報が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information arrives about the location of demon Kessel Link.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森に入った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entered the forest of Transylvania.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is daytime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご機嫌のサテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is in a good mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが自分の助言を聞いてくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance listened to her advice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐには出ずに昼寝
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They don't go out immediately but take a nap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして夕方になってから森に出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then they head out to the forest in the evening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトス将軍が同行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Amitos accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜の森を進撃中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advancing through the forest at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスによる怪談話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scary stories told by Amitos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リリムという娘、森の売春宿
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl named Lilim, a brothel in the forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイド達の日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The everyday life of apostle maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入者警報が鳴り使徒メイドが迎撃に出る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An intruder alarm sounds; apostle maids go out to intercept.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクが強くなるのは夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kessel Link grows stronger at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故にその夜に出撃するのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do they sortie out that night?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスとサテラが疑問を投げかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos and Satera raise this question.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイド達、不幸な生い立ち
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apostle maids have unfortunate backgrounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクに救われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were saved by Kessel Link.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイドが現れ警告を告げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An apostle maid appears and issues a warning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脅迫して情報を聞きだそうとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They try to extract information through threats,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクへの忠誠心は高く失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But their loyalty to Kessel Link is strong, so it fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げられてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They manage to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり朝
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time they arrive at the mansion, it's completely morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中に夜が明けると計算していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had calculated that night would dawn during the move.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

threats,"},{"lineNumber":253368,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクへの忠誠心は高く失敗","translatedEnglishLine":"But their loyalty to Kessel Link is strong, so it fails."},{"lineNumber":253369,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t逃げられてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"They manage to escape."},{"lineNumber":253370,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり朝","translatedEnglishLine":"By the time they arrive at the mansion, it's completely morning."},{"lineNumber":253371,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t移動中に夜が明けると計算していた","translatedEnglishLine":"They had calculated that night would dawn during the move."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くに上杉陣地があり気になっている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a Uesugi camp nearby, and they seem to be concerned about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上杉陣地に寄る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Approach the Uesugi camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信、愛の会話、慕われている謙信
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, a conversation about love, Kenshin is admired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虎子のクマ耳に興味を持つピグとあてな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pigu and Atena are interested in Torako's bear ears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中の村でモンスター退治
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster hunting in a village along the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お礼でアナセルを犯す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As thanks, they rape Anasel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 警備隊が困っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The security squad is in trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この先の街道に凶悪なモンスターが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is a vicious monster on the road ahead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍隊で無いと倒せない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It cannot be defeated without an army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街道を塞ぐ巨大なモンスター
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge monster blocking the highway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Rangbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦会議の前にシーラと寝る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sleep with Sheila before the strategy meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 司令部で戦況状況を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear the war situation at headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下室、ロレックス将軍他多数が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the basement, General Rolex and many others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チュパ病に感染し隔離されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are infected with Chupa disease and quarantined.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 暗い雰囲気だがランスは前向き
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mood is gloomy, but Rance is positive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が魔人を倒せば万事解決
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I defeat the demon, everything will be resolved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物襲撃の報告が来たので出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A report of a monster attack arrives, so they deploy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に到着するが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the battlefield, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目指すは魔人なので迂回する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the target is the demon, they take a detour.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、どこかのヘルマン砦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at some Helman fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイドの攻撃を受けていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were under attack by apostle maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍と偶然につれしょん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encountered the monster general by chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the monster general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹の中からは年寄りでがっかり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Disappointed, it was an old man from inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラとシィルのダブル奴隷を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With Sheila and Shiru, a double slave affair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はべらしてくつろぐランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance relaxes with them attending him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラとシィルとセックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sex with Sheila and Shiru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝から忙しそうな大統領シーラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: President Sheila looks busy from the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクの居場所の情報が入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information arrives about the location of demon Kessel Link.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森に入った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entered the forest of Transylvania.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is daytime.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご機嫌のサテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is in a good mood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが自分の助言を聞いてくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance listened to her advice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐには出ずに昼寝
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They don't go out immediately but take a nap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして夕方になってから森に出撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then they head out to the forest in the evening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトス将軍が同行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Amitos accompanies them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜の森を進撃中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Advancing through the forest at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスによる怪談話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scary stories told by Amitos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リリムという娘、森の売春宿
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A girl named Lilim, a brothel in the forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイド達の日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The everyday life of apostle maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入者警報が鳴り使徒メイドが迎撃に出る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An intruder alarm sounds; apostle maids go out to intercept.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクが強くなるのは夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Kessel Link grows stronger at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何故にその夜に出撃するのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do they sortie out that night?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトスとサテラが疑問を投げかける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos and Satera raise this question.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイド達、不幸な生い立ち
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apostle maids have unfortunate backgrounds.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクに救われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were saved by Kessel Link.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイドが現れ警告を告げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An apostle maid appears and issues a warning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 脅迫して情報を聞きだそうとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They try to extract information through threats,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクへの忠誠心は高く失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But their loyalty to Kessel Link is strong, so it fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げられてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They manage to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 屋敷に到着した時にはすっかり朝
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the time they arrive at the mansion, it's completely morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中に夜が明けると計算していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had calculated that night would dawn during the move.
